Interface CategoryUpdater

public interface CategoryUpdater

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Collection<String>

    Provides a list of updatable categories

  • Method Details

    • updateCategory

      void updateCategory(String categoryName) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Update the specified category
      Parameters:
      categoryName - the name of the category to update
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when an unknown category name is provided.
      LockingException - when the current thread is unable to obtain the lock for starting a transaction

    • updateCategories

      void updateCategories()
      Update all categories.
      Throws:
      LockingException - when the current thread is unable to obtain the lock for starting a transaction

    • updateCategoriesIfNecessary

      void updateCategoriesIfNecessary()
      Update all categories that haven't recently been updated. This depends on the property headsplugin.categories.update.interval in config.yml
      Throws:
      LockingException - when the current thread is unable to obtain the lock for starting a transaction

    • updateCategoriesIfNecessaryAsync

      void updateCategoriesIfNecessaryAsync()
      Update all categories that haven't recently been updated asynchronously. This depends on the property headsplugin.categories.update.interval in config.yml
      Throws:
      LockingException - when the current thread is unable to obtain the lock for starting a transaction

    • getUpdatableCategoryNames

      Collection<String> getUpdatableCategoryNames(boolean necessaryOnly)
      Provides a list of updatable categories
      Parameters:
      necessaryOnly - return only the categories that are outside of the update interval
      Returns:
      the updatable categories
